Name: Cerulean Echoes Adrift in the Winds: Part II
Description: Head to the lower level and rescue the trapped Aetherfin with KU-Key
QuestDesc: Head to the lower level and rescue the trapped Aetherfin with KU-Key

Conditions.PreQuestName: Cerulean Echoes Adrift in the Winds: Part I

Dialogues.Speaker: KU-Key
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: It would take a lot of time to walk there, so I've requested temporary access to the Shorekeeper's portals.

Dialogues.Speaker: KU-Key
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: With them, we can move much faster.

Options.PlotLineKey: When can I learn this skill?

Dialogues.Speaker: KU-Key
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Of course! As your best assistant, I've got to know these things.

Dialogues.Speaker: KU-Key
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: If you want to learn it… you'd need to link your mind to the Tethys System, and then—

Dialogues.Speaker: KU-Key
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: You can also activate the portals with your special clearance, just like last time.

Dialogues.Speaker: KU-Key
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Anyway, I've opened up the portal for you. Let's get going!

Dialogues.Speaker: KU-Key
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: You're welcome! Actually, I've already taken one while we were on the surface! I'll print it as well!

Dialogues.Speaker: KU-Key
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: By the way, the Shorekeeper just helped us. It would be nice to thank her in person.

Dialogues.Speaker: KU-Key
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: It must be quite a while since she's seen the Aetherfins again.
